mapper.select: SELECT sale_attr_value_id, sku_id, sale_attr_value_name FROM sku_sale_attr_value ssav, sku_info si WHERE ssav.sku_id = si.id AND si.spu_id = #{0} ORDER BY si.id ,ssav.sale_attr_id

select group_concat(sale_attr_value_id order by sale_attr_id asc separator '|')value_ids,sku_id from sku_sale_attr_value sv inner join sku_info si on sv.sku_id=si.id where spu_id=#{spuId} group by sku_id
